lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, July 2 -- German military quarters revealed today that heavily reinforced German units have been thrown into the fighting in the center and south of the Eastern Front. It is therefore presumed that the major activities that are to mark the beginning of the main offensive are under way and that the coming weeks will witness important actions in the further progress of the European War.
abstract: Axis forces reptd strengthened, central and southern sectors
